name: Asteroids (itch) (omoNattie)
description:
Source Code

Asteroids is a game mimicking the arcade classic game "Asteroids".

This game is made in the Godot game engine and its my first game outside of the fantasy console, Pico8.

It was made in one week as a test of my abilities of what I've learned in time, so it wont be the best game.

Controls:

A, D -  Steer left and right

SPACE - Shoot

SHIFT - Speed up
